Item.name: Butcher Knife
Item.description: A sharp and easily concealed knife, best used for cutting apart bodies.

Item.name: Spoiled Meat
Item.description: Meat that is far past its expiration date.

Item.name: Decaying Meat
Item.description: Meat that is perpetually decaying, tainted by a dark energy.

Item.name: Mystery Meat
Item.description: Rations, a can of several meat products. Better than starving.

Item.name: Raw Crawler Meat
Item.description: Might make a decent snack.

Item.name: Cooked Crawler Chunks
Item.description: Pieces of Crawler flesh which vaguely resemble chicken nuggets, deep fried in plant oil.

Item.name: Raw Mudraptor Meat
Item.description: Might be good for a steak.

Item.name: Mudraptor Meat
Item.description: A small steak made of Mudraptor meat and seasoned to perfection.

Item.name: Watcher Meat
Item.description: You sure about this?

Item.name: Raw Thresher Meat
Item.description: Tastes like chicken.

Item.name: Thresher Tenders
Item.description: Pieces of Thresher flesh which vaguely resemble chicken tenders, deep fried in plant oil. Superior to Crawler Chunks overall.

Item.name: Hammerhead Ham
Item.description: A large piece of Hammerhead flesh, cooked into a large ham and sweetened with Pomegrenade juice.

Item.name: Raw Spineling Meat
Item.description: This doesn't seem very sturdy, but it might make a good filler.

Item.name: Spineling Sausage
Item.description: Just as phallic as the creature it was made from.

Item.name: Comically Large Spineling Sausage
Item.description: Show all your crewmates your massive sausage!

Item.name: Moloch Sushi
Item.description: Surprisingly buoyant due to air pockets, and impossible to cook.

Item.name: Raw Abyssal Flesh
Item.description: Ready to be made into a feast fit for a monster slayer.

Item.name: Abyssal Abalone
Item.description: Meat from titanic Abyssal creatures, cut out and placed into pieces of their shells. A delicacy and a triumph.

Item.name: Raw Charybdis Meat
Item.description: Ready to be made into a feast fit for a monster slayer.

Item.name: Charybdis Calamari
Item.description: Some of the Charybdis's smaller tentacles shaped into rings, deep fried, and seasoned.

Item.name: Husk Caviar
Item.description: A small but carefully prepared dish of (hopefully) deactivated husk eggs.

Item.name: Canteen
Item.description: A canteen which can be filled by going out the airlock. Unpurified.

Item.name: Purified Canteen
Item.description: A canteen of purified water.
Unidentified genetic material from a Crawler.
Unidentified genetic material from a Mudraptor.
Unidentified genetic material from a Watcher.
Unidentified genetic material from a Thresher.
Unidentified genetic material from a Hammerhead.
Unidentified genetic material from a Spineling.
Unidentified genetic material from a Moloch.
Unidentified genetic material from Husks.
